title: [Ruins, Altar Approach]
description: A series of arches lead north toward a slightly raised dais in the center of the ruins.  Originating with something unseen atop the platform, the ground here is stained an unsettling dark red, in stark contrast to the beach visible in the distance with its glistening, white sands.

A series of arches lead north toward a slightly raised platform in the center of the ruins.  Originating with something unseen atop the platform, the ground here is stained an unsettling dark red, in stark contrast to the beach visible in the distance with its glistening white sands.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, east, west, northwest
